column3: News;Kandal:------  Man using mains electricity to shock rats was himself electrocuted in a stream in the village of Prek Svay commune 2 Beach district
column9: was a Khmer residing in  Kien Svay district
column10: Kandal province.------Authorities arrived at the scene and cooperated with the commune chief of Chheu Teal village and Prek Svay village chief. A doctor visited the corpse and gave cause of death as electric shock.------The body was then handed over to relatives.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/282085
